00036 namespace affx {
00037   class ClfFile;
00038 };
00039 
00040 /// To be called a CLF file, the file requires
00041 class affx::ClfFile {
00042 public:
00043   affx::TsvFile m_tsv; ///< public so people can work with it
00044 
00045   /// If you want the string forms, use "clf->tsv->get(0,"probe_id",probe_id_string)"
00046   //#%header0=probe_id  x       y
00047   int probe_id; ///< The probe id
00048   int x;        ///< The x position of the probe
00049   int y;        ///< The y position of the probe
00050 
00051   /// @brief     Create the ClfFile object
00052   ClfFile();
00053   /// @brief     Destroy a ClfFile object
00054   ~ClfFile();
00055 
00056   ///
00057   int getXMax();
00058 
00059   int getYMax();
00060 
00061   /// @brief     Return the value of the sequential header
00062   /// @return    int value of the header or -1 if not present
00063   int getSequential();
00064 
00065   /// @brief     Return the value of the order header
00066   /// @return    the value of the order header if present
00067   std::string getOrder();
00068 
00069   /// @brief     Make the bindings which define a CLF file
00070   void makeClfBindings();
00071 
00072   /// @brief     Open a CLF file
00073   /// @param     filename     the pathname of the file
00074   /// @return    tsv_return_t
00075   int open(const std::string& filename);
00076 
00077   /// @brief     Start the write to a file
00078   /// @param     filename
00079   /// @return    tsv_return_t
00080   int write(const std::string& filename);
00081 
00082   /// @brief     Close a PGF file
00083   /// @return    tsv_return_t
00084   int close();
00085 
00086   /// @brief     Rewind back to the start of the CLF data
00087   /// @return    tsv_return_t
00088   int rewind();
00089 
00090   /// @brief     Skip to the next probe
00091   /// @return    TSV_LEVEL_LAST when out of probesets
00092   int next_probe();
00093   /// @brief     Define a tsv file as a CLF file.
00094   /// @param     tsv       pointer to tsv to define
00095   /// @return    tsv_return_t
00096   int defineFileClf(TsvFile* tsv);
00097   /// @brief     Define this file as a pgf file
00098   /// @return    tsv_return_t
00099   int defineFileClf();
00100 
00101 };
